verses.roman:
ei-mata bāra-bāra kahi dui-jana
āmā-duṅhāra gaurave kichu phiri' gela mana

synonyms: ei-mata—in this way; bāra-bāra—again and again; kahi—we speak; dui-jana—two persons; āmā-duṅhāra—of us both; gaurave—out of respect; kichu—somewhat; phiri' gela—turned; mana—mind.
translation: "In this way we both spoke to him again and again, and because of this persuasion and his respect for us, his mind turned somewhat toward our instructions.
